content.description: Chimney up a stout starting section for the grade and into upper chimney with lots of great holds and stances. Escape out to the left at the top to keep it at 5.7 or go for the direct finish over a bulge at 5.9.
content.location: The most splitter chimney feature on one of the cleanest most prominent Buttresses in this area.

content.description: To the Left of Sickle Roof (one of the most Distinctive Features on the S. Side) and Sunshine Slab is a series of Buttresses with some overhangs, and gullies and chimneys dividing them. All of the climbs contained in this section should also be to the Right of The South Summit Gully (The deepest Gully west of Sharks Fin Gully) which is a possible descent for climbs or scramble route to the Summit.
